param.name: raw_message_send_count
param.label: User count for raw messages
param.description: The number of users who will get raw messages

param.name: processed_message_send_count
param.label: User count for processed messages
param.description: The number of users who will get processed messages

param.name: delayed_resolution_period
param.label: Delayed Resolution Period
param.description: Number of days for delayed resolution

param.name: raw_complaint_warning_period
param.label: Raw Complaint Warning Period
param.description: Show a warning message if a raw complaint was not processed in N days

param.name: processed_complaint_warning_period
param.label: Processed Complaint Warning Period
param.description: Show a warning message if a processed complaint was not resolved in N days

param.name: map_api_key
param.label: Map API key
param.description: Google Maps API key, you can get one from: http://code.google.com/apis/maps/signup.html
